Package oracle.kubernetes.operator.work

Interface Component

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ComponentEx, ComponentRegistry
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Container, Fiber, Packet
    public interface Component
    Interface that allows components to hook up with each other.
    See Also:
    ComponentRegistry

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static Component createFor​(Object... objects)
      Creates a Component that supports the given SPI instances.
      <S> S getSpi​(Class<S> spiType)
      Gets the specified SPI.

    • Method Detail

      • createFor

        static Component createFor​(Object... objects)
        Creates a Component that supports the given SPI instances. If an instance in objects is a Class then this class is the key for the next object instance. Otherwise, the instance's own class is used.
        Parameters:
        objects - Objects to encapsulate; precede object with Class to specify key type
        Returns:
        Component

      • getSpi

        <S> S getSpi​(Class<S> spiType)
        Gets the specified SPI.

        This method works as a kind of directory service for SPIs, allowing various components to define private contract and talk to each other.

        Type Parameters:
        S - SPI type
        Parameters:
        spiType - SPI class
        Returns:
        null if such an SPI is not provided by this object.
